item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Biography My research interests are related to the field of Human Robot Interaction (HRI). I examining how the use of restricted natural language instructions on the human expert’s side can be used to provide guidance to a robotic agent and thus reder its learning process more sample-efficient, safer and more interpretable. I am currently working on methods that learn low-dimensional vector representations from high-level sensory input, in which high-level semantic concepts, that are manifested in the sensory input, keep their properties.
